content.detailedDescription:
May 24, 2012 about 9:00 pm. we were on the beach at the entrance to ft. pickens when we noticed a bright object that suddenly appeared in the sky to the north of gulf breeze, fl. the object bobbed around for a few minutes and began to descend. the light patterns did not match conventional aircraft running lights and were stunningly bright. at first we thought it may be a plane coming into to land at the airport, but it would descend, ascend, and then descend again, sometimes winking out and then reappearing a few degrees higher. after a while we became curious and chased the object down for several miles, driving back into town to an area referred to as "east hill". when we finally got close enough to it to see what it was (approximately 100-300 feet away) we made out a  distinct triangular outline with 3 lights on each corner. (from a distance of three miles the object appears as a glowing golden disk which i presume is due to viewing it "edge on".) my friends who had accompanied me were in a second car closer to the object and stated it made no noise and "glided" over the treetops. after a while it hovered out of our line of sight over the treetops. this incident was one of two that were witnessed by a number of people both within 9 days of each other.

the second incident occurred approximately 9 days later on june 2, 2012. a similar object was sighted and photographed by two different people around the same time period. one photo was taken by each person with a gap of approximately 10 minutes between each sighting. a third and fourth witness whom we met later that night described a similar object that resembled a triangular pattern of lights confirming the earlier sighting.

three photos were included with this report, the first was taken by me, the other two by the the other witnesses 9 days later. the objects in question have been circled in each photos.
content.summary: May 24th -june 2nd 2012 pensacola ufo wave, triangular/disc-like objects observed by multiple witnesses on two different dates

content.detailedDescription: I was setting at my table underneath my back patio as my wife was bbqing, i noticed a yellowish light (like a sodium vapor light) in the diastance. given the angle from my perspective i would imagin it to be around 15 miles out. it seem to me at first to be a helicopter. as it got closer it made am abrupt turn north then totally reverse direction and proceeded south for maby 3 seconds and stopes and hovered in place and glowed incredibly bright. at this point it was mabey 5 miles out. i called over my wife and she seen it also. something else i want to point out is we live under the approach to lax for planes coming in from the north, it's like a highway in the sky. i would guess there altitude to be 5500'. we had a near full moon at the time and the object was at the 7:00 position to the moon. it stayed stationary for 5 minutes then moved into the path of incoming planes, as one plane approached i noticed the object moved to avoid it at the same time it's light intensity decreased then it started to move into the glow of the moon then it blinked a few times then disappeared straight up. i kept an eye out for it but it was gone. as all this was happening i had an uneasy feeling about it and i also felt it was observing the air planes flying into lax. i've observed alot aircraft but nothing has these traits that i witnessed that night, it seemed like it was intelligently operated although somewhat indecisive in what direction to fly in. also i felt like it knew i was observing it and as it flew off it did so by bleeding in with the moon glow.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen in sky with strange movements and interacted with airliner flying beside it then zooming straight upsnd blinking out!

content.detailedDescription: Approximatly 10pm pacific time, i went into my back yard to observe those guys when they are around. this night, one was observed doing a figure eight pattern directly above my house but still at a very high altitude. as usual, i began signaling with my light as i mostly get a signal plash response back. this time, five others instantly zipped into view from all directions directly over me, but at a lower altitude. one dimmed out as it decended down to me. this was the first time i had ever gotten this kind of reaction from flashing my light at them. i ran into my house in a panic and imidiatly called my friend and then my neighbor, informing them that i may have made a mistake and pissed off either the grey guys or the blue guys. either way, i have no plans on going anywhere so if i can't be found than expect foul play. the next morning it was on the news, many sightings where reported. the news broadcaster said that nasa insists it was just a new kind of meteor that comes down in different directions and hovers etc. sightings of it where recorded in corona ca. and arizona. but this is just one of many ongoing sightings i am and have witnessed for many years. i also have photos of past sightings, but it has become more interesting since i discovered a way to communicate with them. i believe that where i made my mistake was using my hand held spot light, i think that made them upset. if anyone uses a light, don't use anything larger than a surefire light, i have had better results with my tac light. one day i will share my experience with the blue guys, but i wont go into to much detail as, since it is top secret military stuff, i won't disrespect their privacy and right to secrecy, but it was very interesting as i was on duty at the time in full uniform. knowing what i know now, i am sure they where laughing their ass's off at me.
content.summary: Personal contact & communication

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were on our way to the market on 7-02-12 in the city of ontario cal. we go to parking lot and started to park when my mother noticed the lights that look like they were hovering above the store. we got out and were later joined by other people. there is no way this could b a hoax, the ligts were at a distance but were so clear and moving at a very fast spe it was on vineyard ave.Ed. changing formation randomly. the colors were amazing!! never seen anything like it! it was onvineyard and 4th st.!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lights moving in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was coming home from the store. looked up in the sky and saw what i thought may be an airplane / helicopter, but it was a bright orange orb flying in the sky. similar in elevation as an airplane, but with no noise. was like light a bright sphere of light that did not blink. orange in color unlike the blue/red or white-yellow lights on most aircraft.
content.summary: Orange orb flying in sky

content.detailedDescription: Our family was camping at watkins woolen mill state park and it was about to rain, so we were rushing to put the rain guard on our tent. about halfway through, my wife asks "what is that up in the sky?" i am a firm disbeliever of alien life visiting this planet and ufos attributed to them, so i looked-up and saw something i could not explain. it was a slow moving ball of light that flickered as it moved. it was completely silent. about 2 minutes into viewing it, the light shut off and then turned back on. it was slowly descending into the horizon, which was trees, when it turned to the left of the horizon very quickly, went really fast, there was a flash and then it disappeared. i could not explain the object, so i told my wife it might have been an experimental govt aircraft, a meteor, or something else scientific. i had this eerie feeling all night afterwards and in the middle of the night my wife and the other 3 women in our party walked-up to go to the bathroom, leaving me all alone in our tent. while they were gone i got extremely paranoid because it felt like something was watching me or spying on me. my heart was racing and i was so relieved when my wife came back. to tell you the truth, im not sure what happened that night, but it has left me feeling awkward ever since.
content.summary: Watkins woolen mill camping ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitiing on deck late evening, perhaps 11 pm or maybe later, not sure, as i was not wearing watch..I was seated with my sister when i looked up into sky and saw the orange bright light hovering over next cottage, and then directly over mine..We called our friend who also witnessed it..None of us have ever seen anything like this...It was silent, above treeline, below clouds...It slowed down a bit, would drop a few feet and move again towards next cottage...We watched this for 1-2 minutes, it may have been longer...But we did not get a picture of it...No engine heard...We were shocked at first...And am upset i do not have physical proof, other than 2 more witnesses..We lost sight of the object due to high trees in the next yard.
content.summary: Solid orange, bright circular with orange aura like halo around it..

content.detailedDescription: I was sitiing on deck late evening, perhaps 11 pm or maybe later, not sure, as i was not wearing watch..I was seated with my sister when i looked up into sky and saw the orange bright light hovering over next cottage, and then directly over mine..We called our friend who also witnessed it..None of us have ever seen anything like this...It was silent, above treeline, below clouds...It slowed down a bit, would drop a few feet and move again towards next cottage...We watched this for 1-2 minutes, it may have been longer...But we did not get a picture of it...No engine heard...We were shocked at first...And am upset i do not have physical proof, other than 2 more witnesses..We lost sight of the object due to high trees in the next yard.

content.detailedDescription:
the night of june 27th, 2012 at around 10:45 p.M. i went outside for a cigarette and to watch the stars as i do several times every night when i spotted what i thought was a plane.  i was facing west and this thing was hovering about 35 to 40 degrees off the horizon and seemed closer than an aircraft should be (maybe about a quarter mile away if not closer).  but, the more i stared at it i noticed that it had 3 horizontal round  white lights in a straight line with red and green lights underneath flashing at a very fast rate.  the 3 white lights did not blink and i could see them lit the entire time and remained in a straight line.  i believe the 3 lights were portholes since they were not very bright. the object was moving slowly but strangely.
     i went inside to grab my binoculars and came back out and the object was still hovering in about the same spot but, doing a circular motion and moving up and down and sideways.  i focused the binoculars on it and played with the zoom in and out trying to get a clear look when i noticed the 3 white lights started to turn vertically and then kept turning until it did a 360 degree turn.  this is when i went inside and told my husband to come outside.  he tried using the binoculars and even went inside to get his hunting spotting scope but could not get a perfect view of it since we have a light on a pole close to our deck which makes it harder to see the sky.  he still thought it was a strange sight and not a plane. i had a better view of it since i was a little further away from that pole lamp. we watched it for several minutes before it finally took off slowly and finally went behind a tree where we could still see some lights through the leaves before it finally disappeared from our view.
     the whole episode must have lasted about 10 minutes and i could never get a clear view of the body of the object because the green and red lights were flashing so bright and fast (and i was shaking a bit)  but it seemed to have a dark (maybe black, gray or silver) body.  i could not tell the shape of the body but if i had to guess it appeared to be cigar or disc shape.  i have never seen anything like this in my entire life.  every night i watch the planes, stars, planets, satellites and occasionally shooting stars in the sky and am very familiar with objects in the night sky but this was a new experience for me.  it was both exciting and a bit scary.
content.summary: Red and green flashing lights below 3 round white portholes

content.detailedDescription: The witness, a 41 year old male, was outside smoking when he noted a low flying object moving from the southwest to a northeast direction. he described it as being a triangle shape with no lights visible and no sound heard. he estimated it as flying at about 500to 1,000 feet altitude and it appeared to be doing a ���flipping motion���. he is certain it was no conventional aircraft. the duration was brief, 30-45 seconds, and then it vanished from his sight.
content.summary: Flying object

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving west on i-94 when it looked like there were two suns in the sky. one sun, the real sun was bigger, but there was a smaller one just as bright off to the left. it was the weirdest thing ever. i did get three pics of them. i expected to hear something about it on the news, but never did. clearly other people had to see it, were driving down a highway. this is the first time i am talking about it.
content.summary: Looked like there was two suns in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving west on i-94 when it looked like there were two suns in the sky. one sun, the real sun was bigger, but there was a smaller one just as bright off to the left. it was the weirdest thing ever. i did get three pics of them. i expected to hear something about it on the news, but never did. clearly other people had to see it, were driving down a highway. this is the first time i am talking about it.
content.summary: Looked like there was two suns in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw it when i was driving from the slivnica pri mariboru on the normal road (non high way) towards the city through hoce going onto the high-way at the first junction.

the ball was grey, dull, appeared to be hovering still but i was unable to get a perfect view because i was driving in car the whole time, i was seeing it for 10-15 mins by then i came to the shopping centers o the right of the highway about 4 km from where i first saw it, i was driving on as the angle became impossible because the shere was behind me heavy right side at that point, it did not look like a helicopter at all, it was just a ball, no movements, no idea how long it it was there, it was definitely not a balloon and i've seen them so many times, this was a perfect sphere, also it almost looked like it had gradient from darker gray to lighter gray, maybe because of low sun and some clouds around but it was well below the cloud-line.

what made me first notice it, it was freaking huge for it's distance, darker and larger than the usual aircraft there and definitely larger than a helicopters that fly every few months around here.

i had no other people witnesses, i've told nobody either.


i only have memory it happend so long ago and cameras or cellphones with good cameras were not even around much those times.
content.summary: Big grey ball hovering about 200-300 meters close to airport

content.detailedDescription: On either the 26th or 27th of june 2012 i awoke that morning with a burning sensation in my right sinus, like a couple of drops of some caustic fluid had been put there - as if i were laying on my back & it dripped in.. kinda hard to explain. anyway, i rolled over to tell my partner about it & noticed two fresh marks on his back; circular & below the shoulder blade which later turned into bruises. i have photos of the bruises & will submit them if there is a place for it. there was nothing in the bed that would have caused this bruising, that was the 1st place i looked. i also scoured the house & found nothing that would make marks like that, so perfectly aligned. later, when i stepped out of the shower, i noticed several small bruises & marks on my upper body [like i had been in a fight]. neither of us remember dreaming that night nor any memory of how we got those marks on us. the dogs didn't alert us to anything that night [they didn't bark & wake us up]. another odd thing is, the garage door was open that morning. could all be coincidence & who knows about the garage thing but i thought i should share.
content.summary: Possible abduction

content.detailedDescription: In backyard. saw what looked like a 3 stars but way too bright. one was about 100 feet maybe below the other. the top one was brightest of the two. a smaller dimmer light appeared to be below the less bright light. i thought it was a helicopter or plane but all 3 stayed in one spot in the same position, very strange. it also looked like a bunch of planes flying around and passing the lights. i was looking thru binocs but couldn't get a clear view.
content.summary: 3 lights in a line

content.detailedDescription: In fowlerville,michigan also july 2nd 2012, i was outside lighting smoke bombs with my son, we had a couple bottle rockets so i lit them off for him, as we were looking in the sky at the bottle rockets , i noticed a star started to move, at first i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, but then, it started to go in a down and westward, then it started to go up and eastward, then down and westward again, it was very far away from the looks of it, like i said, i thought it was just  a star at first, after it moved around for a little while (this was about 4 minutes) it started going up and then slowly faded and disappeared. i personally have never seen anything like that in my life. i was so excited, my father was outside and i called for him in such a hurry he believed that something bad had happened, the old man watched it with me. it was sphere shaped, emitted a soft white light, nothing else. i did see it flicker on and off about 10 minutes later to the far east sky, it appeared moved around, then disappeared, reappeared moved around and flickered out like a candle and disappeared... very lucky to see this!!
content.summary: Saw white star-like ufo move around dif directions, for app. 6 minutes, it faded away and disappeared afterwards.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just watched the sun set when i noticed a light in the sky. i watched for a few minutes. at first i thought it was a contrail from a jet reflecting the sun, but it seemed to bright and the movement seemed to slow. it came from the direction of the sunset, but slightly north and traveled in a southerly direction. i could not determine what it was. at 8:34pm, i went in to the house and grabbed my iphone. i was able to obtain 13 pictures as it traveled through the sky until it disappeared at 8:40 pm. just as it disappeared i noticed another object in the sky at 8:42 pm coming from the exact same location and traveling the identical path as the first. i was able to take 13 pictures before it disappeared at 8:43. it traveled a shorter distance before it disappeared out of sight.

both objects look similar in shape and size, traveled the same identical path and seemed to emit a red color (glow) from behind.
content.summary: 2 bright objects seen over the sierra nevada mountains at sunse on july 2 2012.

content.detailedDescription: I sat outside on my front porch to have a cigarette around 1 am and soon noticed an object appear from behind the trees and home across the street. i quickly stood up to examine it, as it's flight pattern/characteristics were mechanical-like. it was traveling diagonally away from the home, so i observed the rear of the craft. it seemed to wobble and teeter a bit and traveled slowly above the powerlines and trees. it had two round propellers on either side of its rear. i watched it continue on a straight course, till it was no longer in my range. it was approximately 3 feet wide and had a dark coloring. the "propellers" had a lighter color...More of a yellow/gold. it travelled around 15mph. the "wobbling" flight was most unusual and i made sure to observe it carefully to confirm it wasn't  bird of some sort.
content.summary: Small dark craft, appeared to slightly wobble...Two round things on back propelled it slowly. no sound or lights. low flying.

content.detailedDescription:
12:04 am 03/07/2012
sighting of two disk-shaped objects following a small aircraft about 10:15 p.M. on monday night, july 2, 2012

my location is st. catharines, on. 

i saw a small aircraft, with the usual red/green signal lights visible. i could also hear it as it flew in a north-western direction almost directly above me.
it was north-east of the house. i was sitting in a reclining lawn chair at the back of my house. the full moon was rising in the south-east and was not visible to me. my large cherry tree and garage was blocking it from view. the reclining chair was pointing directly east and i could see with my naked eyes the stars vega and deneb. altair was somewhere behind the cherry tree/back fence. a few very faint stairs were also visible. 

in the area there are lights from the elementary school behind me and lights also from the parking lot of mandarin restaurant and canadian tire financial call centre.

i pointed my 10x50 bausch & lomb binoculars at the aircraft and immediately notice two objects following the aircraft. they had no signal lights and did not appear to be lit up. they were grey round objects, and from my perspective they were the same size as the wing span of the plane. one was closer to the plane and the other just behind it and off to one side. as i watched, the two objects lined up behind each other, about five spaces between then. (four or five objects of the same size would fit between them.) it is difficult for me to say how far behind the aircraft these two objects were. not a large distance.

just as the airplane was moving towards the north-east corner of my house, i moved my binoculars away from the objects to the aircraft. when i tried to locate the two objects again, i could not find them.

for the next hour i watched other aircraft in the sky, all of them flying much higher than the first aircraft. i did not see anything unusual following these other terrestrial airplanes. 

what makes this observation interesting? the two saucers were following the aircraft. both of them lined up one behind the other. they were not bright, but dull grey in colour. while they were about the same size as the aircraft, they were distinctly different. i'm sure that i would not have seen then without the binoculars.

notes:
i live about 5 blocks from the welland canal to the east. on the other side of the canal is the st. catharines airport.
the sky was clear, but there was a haze that blocked most of the stars. this haze reflected light from parking lots at a mall and elementary school.
i was shaded from these city lights by my house and garage and backyard trees.
it was a hot but dry night.
the object were seen overhead.
there were no other witnesses. photos not possble, not enough light.
no military bases or airfields nearby.
my reaction was one of slight surprise. i've always been an alien ufo skeptic and would welcome a sensible explanation.
content.summary: Sighting of two disk-shaped objects following and then line up behind a small aircraft about 10:15 p.M. on monday night, july 2, 2012

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was seen in wet virginia
content.summary: Ufo seen over area

content.detailedDescription:
9:20 my dad and i went outside to study the moons movement for my astronomy merit badge.  we looked at spica, saturn and mars.  when my dad mentioned the moons traverse westward, i see a floating orange and red egg shaped light to my right shoulder.  at first i think it���s a helicopter but i still keep my eye on it. 
9:25 my dad goes back inside but i stay behind to see if i could see that light again and as i���m walking back i look back and see two lights; one red going east from the north and one orange and red going south from the north.  the object looked like it was on fire���rotating between red, orange and yellow.  but there were no lights in the center of the object.  
so i run to the door and call my dad then i turn around and i can���t see it because it���s behind some trees. 
9:30 when my dad comes out the object is visible he tells me to run and get the binoculars inside. i get the binoculars and run outside. he says��� it hasn���t moved������as the object comes to rest eastward between some trees. it seemed to be floating not moving in any direction.  so i look at the object and it starts to speed up heading east directly away from us.
9:35 my dad asks for the binoculars and says ���it���s winking out��� and disappears.  he mentioned that it seemed to just get smaller���like it was traveling straight away from us.
9:40 we go inside and tell our family and my mom and dad ask me to find out how to report my sighting.
content.summary: Teardop fire orbs red-orange-yellow high ridge, missouti

content.detailedDescription: I live in towson/parkville md. on friday june 29th approx one hour after the horrible thunder storm we had on the east coast i saw a large glowing tri color ufo. we lost power at about 10:30pm during the storm and i was sitting in my living room reading by candle light. at about 11:30 (i didnt have power so i am quessing at the time)i went to the door to see what damage there was on my street. instead i was amazed to see in the sky a round sphere type object that was white in the middle,with rings of yellow,orange and a glow of red. it was slowly desending until it was out of my view obscured by trees and buildings. my entire sighting lasted about 45 secs. it was after the storm but there was still a soft steady rain. as far as i could tell it was silent. i have no idea about the distance.I thought to go get someone else to see it but could tell i wouldnt have enough time. after it disappeared i continued to stare at the are dumbfounded. it was the first time i saw a ufo. i would like to find others who saw this that night. it had to of been seen by others. it was amazing,if you saw this please report it.
content.summary: I saw a red/orange glowing ufo that appeared to be desending from mid sky until it disappeared behind the trees/view line,

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
on june 17 2012 at 8:41pm(xenia, ohio) i stepped outside from work to take a video of some very strange clouds. i filmed them(clouds) for roughly two and a half minutes. about fifteen minutes later i went back out and filmed another minute, not sure why-this puzzles me. nothing more that night. i think about two or three days later i used the cloud video to make a video w/ my music(guitar). i then posted it on you tube. i think later that night i was watching the video i had made(w/ music) and after a few times i began to feel quite odd for no apparrent reason-i can vividly recall at one point thinking to myself, "was that a ufo in the video?", and sure enough, there it was, what appeared to be a metalic disc, emitting a cloud like mist, hovering in the sky. i am not sure how close it was because the mist it was emitting might have actually have been a cloud. so i would say it was either about 30 ft. in diameter or much, much larger. it appeared to have a dome on the bottom and top. it was a similar color to the sky but darker and i could see it reflecting light, i think it was rotating slowly but i am not sure.
    i later noticed two objects in the video above a restaurant. one was pizza-box shaped w/ dome. it was cloaked in a misty cloud-like cover which trailed off to the left, sort of flame-like. next to it is another cloaked object, but cloaked different, it was triangle shaped and seemed to 'smear'
the light in a way which hid it very well.
    the final object is the largest, furthest and clearest. it was in the clouds, kind of peeking out, very well hidden but not disguised. it appears in my video a few times(while panning right to left a couple times). it can also be seen in the second video i took(15 min later) as it moved off and up to the right. it was huge. it might have been a half-mile or so. the object was book-shaped and metalic, and had large , rectangular windows that can bee seen along the top of two of the visible sides.
    the video can much better show what i can say about it. there is something very strange about the fact i did not notice them at the time. there were about four people having dinner 25ft away from me and they sure 
seemed oblivious as well.
content.summary: I took a video of some very odd clouds while at work and about a day later noticed the objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from the mall in selinsgrove, pa and as i was coming down market street past the hotel edison i saw up above to the left of me an orange glowing orb in the sky. first thought maybe mars was closer than usual-- the moon was huge in the sky. the orange light was hovering, and i didnt know what to make of it. thought at first perhaps some kind of aerial fireworks-- it is july 2 as of this report but fireworks dont hover and move like that. i went back around the block to get a better view and it had dissapeared completely. 
i then contacted a ufo center in ohio and they told me to spread the news; i also googled and found many of the same exact orange fireballs reported in northumberland country here as well as through state college
i contacted wnep tv and they are talking to the meteoroloigst to see if anything was going on of interest that might have caused it.
content.summary: Orange glowing orb -- by itself.

content.detailedDescription: at about 2:30 am, july 2, 2012 my son saw an object through the 2nd floor bathroom window of our house in the northwest area of the sky(nw oriented from that position).  the object was stationary not moving at all!  it had 3 lights in a horizontal alignment, but rather close together.  the middle light was pink or light red, and the light on each side of it was a pale shade of yellowish green.  the pink light was blinking or flashing on and off irregularly.  object was in a horizontal or flat shape, more linear or disc(saucer-like?) than anything else.  since object was rather far away it was difficult to get a real accurate look at it's exact shape, or to tell it's actual size.  it hovered where we could see it for about 10min. then drifted below the tree line.  all this was between 2:30am and 2:45am.  all our observations were made  using bushnell 8x42wa 430ft at 1000yds binoculars.  my wife saw all this too.   at this point we all went back to bed, but about five minutes later my son called to us that he had sighted another such flying object.  this one was visible only from the front of our house, in the northeast area of the sky, relative to our house(position), at least 120degrees away from the position of the 1st flying object.  this second flying object was either the first object we had seen in the nw quadrant of the sky or one exactly like it, with the same lights and horizontal shape. we all watched this 2nd stationary, hovering flying object from approx. 2:50am to 3:20am, and the object didn't move at all!!!  it stayed right in the exact same position where it was when my son first sighted it.  by 3:20 or so we got tired of watching the motionless object and went back to bed again.  at just about 4:00am, since i couldn't get back to sleep, i got up to take one last look.  the object was still there, although it had moved about five degrees to the east.  this report is respectfully submitted to mufon of ri or nearest chapter to ri.  we invite and hope to have questions or other communications from mufon.  thank you very much.
content.summary: Floating objects, both clearly visible from west east sides of our house. looked like stars, but had blinking pink/white/green lights.

content.detailedDescription: at about 2:30 am, july 2, 2012 my son saw an object through the 2nd floor bathroom window of our house in the northwest area of the sky(nw oriented from that position).  the object was stationary not moving at all!  it had 3 lights in a horizontal alignment, but rather close together.  the middle light was pink or light red, and the light on each side of it was a pale shade of yellowish green.  the pink light was blinking or flashing on and off irregularly.  object was in a horizontal or flat shape, more linear or disc(saucer-like?) than anything else.  since object was rather far away it was difficult to get a real accurate look at it's exact shape, or to tell it's actual size.  it hovered where we could see it for about 10min. then drifted below the tree line.  all this was between 2:30am and 2:45am.  all our observations were made  using bushnell 8x42wa 430ft at 1000yds binoculars.  my wife saw all this too.   at this point we all went back to bed, but about five minutes later my son called to us that he had sighted another such flying object.  this one was visible only from the front of our house, in the northeast area of the sky, relative to our house(position), at least 120degrees away from the position of the 1st flying object.  this second flying object was either the first object we had seen in the nw quadrant of the sky or one exactly like it, with the same lights and horizontal shape. we all watched this 2nd stationary, hovering flying object from approx. 2:50am to 3:20am, and the object didn't move at all!!!  it stayed right in the exact same position where it was when my son first sighted it.  by 3:20 or so we got tired of watching the motionless object and went back to bed again.  at just about 4:00am, since i couldn't get back to sleep, i got up to take one last look.  the object was still there, although it had moved about five degrees to the east.  this report is respectfully submitted to mufon of ri or nearest chapter to ri.  we invite and hope to have questions or other communications from mufon.  thank you very much.
